Class CareerStaffView

java.lang.Object
boundaries.CareerStaffView
public class CareerStaffView extends Object
Boundary class responsible for handling all user interactions for Career Staff. This class connects user input/output with controller logic in CareerStaffController.

This class contains methods:

  • Viewing and approving company representative account requests
  • Viewing and approving internship opportunity creation requests
  • Viewing and approving internship withdrawal requests
  • Changing passwords for logged in users
  • Generating internship reports and saves it to a txt file
  • Filtering and displaying internship opportunities based on selected criteria, selected filter is saved
  • Logging out

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(AppContext Context, Scanner sc)
      Runs the main UI loop for the career staff user. Displays a menu and handles user selection until logout.
      Parameters:
      appContext - application context containing session data
      scanner - scanner for reading user input

    • viewPendingAccountCreationReqs

      public void viewPendingAccountCreationReqs(Scanner sc, CareerStaffController careerStaffController)
      Displays all pending company representative account creation requests. Allows the career staff to approve one of the requests.
      Parameters:
      scanner - user input scanner
      controller - controller handling approval logic

    • viewPendingOpportunities

      public void viewPendingOpportunities(Scanner sc, CareerStaffController careerStaffController)
      Displays all pending internship opportunity creation requests. Allows the career staff to approve one of them.
      Parameters:
      scanner - scanner for user input
      controller - controller responsible for approving opportunities

    • viewWithdrawalReqs

      public void viewWithdrawalReqs(Scanner sc, CareerStaffController careerStaffController)
      Displays all pending internship withdrawal requests. Allows the career staff to approve accordingly.
      Parameters:
      scanner - scanner for user input
      controller - controller that processes withdrawal approvals

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(AppContext context, Scanner sc, CareerStaffController controller)
      Allows the currently logged-in user to change their password.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller responsible for saving updated user data
      appContext - application context containing the active session
      scanner - scanner for user input

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport(CareerStaffController careerStaffController)
      Generates a formatted internship opportunities report and saves it to a text file.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller that provides the list of opportunities

    • filterOpportunities

      public void filterOpportunities(Scanner sc, CareerStaffController careerStaffController, AppContext context)
      Allows the user to set custom filters for viewing internship opportunities. Saves the chosen filter to session and displays the filtered results.
      Parameters:
      scanner - scanner used for user input
      controller - controller that performs filtering logic
      appContext - application context containing session data
